import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { OrderDetailsService } from 'src/app/services/order-details.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.css'] }) export class HomeComponent implements OnInit { constructor(private service:OrderDetailsService) { } foodData:any; ngOnInit(): void { this.foodData = this.service.foodDetails; } }
